entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
